title: Preseason 9
body:
Hey everyone :)

Just  a quick question, anyone know when the preseason 9 update/patch will drop for OCE? 

TY

replies.body: As far as I'm aware, the first patch for preseason 9 is set to drop tomorrow, with the OCE server going down at 5am AEDT for patch maintenance and planned to be back up at 8am AEDT.
That's just a regular server maintenance, Preseason 9 arrives with Patch 8.23 on the 21st.

> [{quoted}](name=Riñey,realm=NA,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=OAAliwPE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-11-13T01:34:45.026+0000)
>
> That's just a regular server maintenance, Preseason 9 arrives with Patch 8.23 on the 21st.

If its season 9 then wont it be patch 9.1 not 8.23? IDK and where did you find this out
No season 9 doesn’t start till sometime in January.. Pre season is 8.23, it doesn’t roll over to 9 until season 9 starts next year.

Do you have an official source for that? I looked around a bit but couldn't find anything from Riot about the date (or time-frame) the first preseason patch goes live.

Like, my statement is an educated guess based on a few factors, but if there's an official date from Riot I'd def go with that (just not been able to find one myself).
